summary:
Knossos is an ancient site on the island of Crete, Greece. It was an important place for the Minoan people who lived there thousands of years ago. The most famous part is the Palace of Minos, which was not a home for a king but a special building for religious and important work. The palace was built around 1900 BC and was used for many centuries.

Archaeologists found many interesting things at Knossos, like beautiful paintings and statues. It is a popular place for visitors to explore and learn about ancient history.
title: Knossos
